Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-5455 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-5455 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.12.11-18, affected by CVE-2025-5455
